name: Impossible Dot Up: Don't Get Down
name_original: Impossible Dot Up: Don't Get Down
description:
Impossible Dot Up is a super-fun jumping game that challenges your brain and reflexes!

Tap on the screen to make the dot jump and avoid the blocks.

Simple one touch game play that will keep you entertained for hours!

Features:
- One touch control
- Endless gameplay
- Different characters

Be Warned: Addictive and Fun!

What are you waiting for? Grab Impossible Dot Up and start jumping!
